body.name: Thermalright TL-C12C-S X3 CPU Fan 120mm ARGB Case Cooler Fan, 4pin PWM Silent Computer Fan with S-FDB Bearing Included, up to 1500RPM Cooling Fan（3 Quantities）
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: 【High Performance Cooling Fan】 Automatic speed control of the motherboard through the 4PIN PWM fan cable interface, which can determine the speed according to the temperature of the motherboard, with a maximum speed of 1500RPM. Configured with up to 55cm of cable for PWM series control of fans, ideal for cases and CPU coolers.

【Quality Bearings】The carefully developed quality S-FDB bearings solve the problem of pc cooling fan blade shaking in lifting mode, keeping fan noise to a minimum while providing maximum cooling performance when needed and extending the life of the fan.

[Excellent LED light] The high-brightness LED atomizing argb fan blade can effectively reflect the light, making the ARGB lighting effect softer, and it matches the cooler and case more perfectly. Up to 17 modes of light effects with ARGB support, color can be managed and synchronized through the port on motherboard.

【Silent Fan Size】 Model: TL-C12C-S X3, Size: 120*120*25mm, Speed: 1500RPM±10%, Noise ≤ 25.6dBA Connector: 4pin pwm, Current: 0.20A, Air Pressure: 1.53mm H2O, Air Flow: 66.17CFM, Higher air flow for improved cooling performance.

【Perfect Match】The PC fan can be used not only as a case fan, but is also suitable for use with a cpu cooler to create a cooling effect together, which can take away the dry heat from the case and the high temperature generated by the CPU in operation, allowing for maximum cooling; Ideal for cases, radiators and CPU coolers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars FAN-Tastic! (Sry for the dad Joke)
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. These fans are simply incredible, 1500RPM is more than enough if you intend to use them as system fans, They are completely quiet, I have my PC sitting on my desk about 20 inches away from my head and they are silent.The move PLENTY of air even at 25% I tested this buy putting my hand over the fans which you shouldn't do. I have 3 of them on the bottom of my case acting as intake, they do so well that my GPU fans stay idle most of the time even in this hot summer we're experiencing 2023. I do appreciate that NO warm air builds up in my case thanks to all 4 fans.The price for the 3 pack is great although I wish they had a 4 pack option as I had to buy this +1. Quick suggestion I suggest getting a fan HUB for the ARGB just incase your MOBO does not have enough connectors, I think you can daisy chain the fans together in that scenario but I didn't test that, I just got pretty sweet and easy to install fan hub by "XMSJSIY" an $11 fan hub.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Budget low cost fans (surprising RGB performance and heat dissipation)
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This fan looked a little sketchy on purchase however when I received the fans the quality was surprisingly decent the RGB lights were dissipated properly no hotspots noticeable, on the other hand they supported PWM to control their speeds. The heat dissipation is excellent!Was surprised of the quality, decent fan!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars If the value for money had 5+1 I would give it!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. These suckers have better, vibrant, and matching colors than my Cosair in another build! They are generally less that $15 for a 3 pack?! GET OUT!!! The black(coolmaster micro-atx case, which I do not recommend) the 4 front and top ones are this product. The ones on the GPU in in NZXT case(which I highly recommend) are also this product. These daisy chain perfectly with all the correct cables included. This is the most bang for a buck I got in a long time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: They are a little loud but good for 12$

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Fan Pack Ever
reviews.reviewText: Worth every dime I,ve bought 4 packs of these the first 2 I lost when I lost my PC in a house fire I,m working on a PC right now and these bad boys will be used 5 outta 5 Star pack

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Fast, cheap, and loud
reviews.reviewText: The fans run great, and for any bargain PC build, are a must have. That said they are quite noisy, which depending on who you are, might worry you. Still I'm satisfied especially for the cost, and you do get three for less than $15 USD. Recommend for the budget builder

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nothing better for the price
reviews.reviewText: For the price these are amazing. My PC runs cool and the fans run quiet. Compared to my NZXT stock fan, these fans push more air. I do plan on upgrading to Corsair fans in the future, but these helped save money on my initial build. 100% Recommend if you need good fans and plan on upgrading them latter.

reviews.reviewerName: Carlos Andres Leon AyalaCarlos Andres Leon Ayala
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fans calidad precio
reviews.reviewText: El nivel de ruido es muy bajo, la Luz es básica y lo suficientemente fuerte, Disipadores sólidos que permiten un buen flujo de aire. Definitivamente los volvería a comprar

Shipping was ok, took around 2 weeks for me to receive them in Singapore. They work as intended, no defects. Fan and Argb cables can be daisy chained. Argb cable can be connected to standard argb headers on the motherboard or controllers and then we can control their lighting via software in windows. Airflow was average, not anywhere near the highest airflow fans on the market. I bought 6 fans and used 5 of them to fill out my hyte Y60 case.All in all for the current price less than $20 usd for 3 fans, it is amazing value. I would love to see anyone find another decent argb fan that can beat this in value.
